properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 2:30PM AKST until January 13 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Blowing and drifting snow expected with visibility one
half mile or less at times. South winds gusting to 40 mph.

* WHERE...Northeastern Brooks Range near passes.

* WHEN...Until 6 PM Monday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...South winds gusting to 40 mph through
passes will cause blowing and drifting snow. This could increase
the risk of avalanches in passes as well.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means periods of
blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road
conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST MONDAY
